questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Signboard and rocks
D) Wildlife and animals

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) A quiet street scene
D) A family gathering

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A person
B) A sign
C) A building
D) A car

What is written on the sign?
A) Lake of the Clouds
B) Welcome to the Park
C) Beware of Dogs
D) No Trespassing

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A person
B) A tree
C) Rocks
D) A bench

What is in the background of the photo?
A) A lake
B) Trees
C) A building
D) A street

What is the condition of the sign?
A) New and shiny
B) Old and rusty
C) Broken and unreadable
D) Covered in graffiti

What is the surface beneath the sign?
A) Sand
B) Concrete
C) Grass
D) Water

What color is the sign?
A) Blue
B) Red
C) Brown and white
D) Green

What is the texture of the rock in the foreground?
A) Smooth and polished
B) Rough and natural
C) Painted and decorated
D) Covered in moss

What is the state of the ground around the sign?
A) Paved
B) Covered with snow
C) Grass and small plants
D) Muddy and wet

What is the material of the signpost?
A) Wood
B) Metal
C) Plastic
D) Stone

What does the sign indicate?
A) A warning
B) A welcome message
C) A location
D) A direction

What is the likely purpose of the sign?
A) Advertising
B) Informational
C) Decorative
D) Regulatory

What is the dominant color in the background?
A) Blue
B) Green
C) Yellow
D) Red

What is the sign's lettering style?
A) Modern and sleek
B) Handwritten and rustic
C) Block and bold
D) Cursive and elegant

What is the state of the vegetation around the sign?
A) Dry and withered
B) Lush and green
C) Sparse and barren
D) Colorful and blooming

What element is most prominent in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A sign
C) A person
D) A building

What is the texture of the ground in the foreground?
A) Smooth and paved
B) Rough and rocky
C) Soft and sandy
D) Wet and muddy

How is the sign weathered?
A) Faded paint
B) Rust and corrosion
C) Broken pieces
D) Covered in dirt

What is the relationship between the sign and its surroundings?
A) It contrasts sharply
B) It blends in naturally
C) It stands out brightly
D) It is partially obscured

What is the condition of the trees in the background?
A) Leafless and dead
B) Full and healthy
C) Small and young
D) Recently planted

What is the sign mounted on?
A) A wooden post
B) A metal pole
C) A concrete block
D) A plastic stand

What does the text on the sign suggest about the location?
A) It is a dangerous area
B) It is a scenic area
C) It is a restricted area
D) It is a residential area

What is the primary material of the rocks in the foreground?
A) Granite
B) Sandstone
C) Limestone
D) Marble

What is the overall composition of the photo?
A) Symmetrical
B) Asymmetrical
C) Radial
D) Linear

What is the state of the paint on the sign?
A) Freshly painted
B) Peeling and faded
C) Covered in graffiti
D) Completely worn off

What is the likely function of the sign?
A) To provide information
B) To warn of danger
C) To advertise a product
D) To mark a boundary

What kind of plants are growing around the rocks?
A) Tall grasses
B) Small flowers
C) Thorny bushes
D) Large shrubs

What is the most prominent feature of the rocks in the foreground?
A) Their size
B) Their color
C) Their shape
D) Their texture

What is the sign's orientation?
A) Horizontal
B) Vertical
C) Diagonal
D) Upside down

What is the condition of the ground around the rocks?
A) Dry and cracked
B) Wet and muddy
C) Covered in leaves
D) Grass and small plants

What is the visual impact of the rust on the sign?
A) It adds character
B) It detracts from the sign's message
C) It is unnoticeable
D) It makes the sign unreadable
